title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncover a supernatural mystery involving a young girl with extraordinary powers in the small town of Hawkins, Indiana.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic, embarks on an adventure with a mysterious child.

title: Dark
description: A time travel mystery spanning multiple generations in the small German town of Winden, where the disappearance of children reveals a deep connection to a dark past.

title: One Piece
description: A group of pirates led by Monkey D. Luffy sets out on a grand adventure to find the legendary treasure known as the One Piece and become the Pirate King.

title: His Dark Materials
description: A young girl named Lyra discovers a secret that will alter the course of humanity's future in a world where science, magic, and religion collide.
